aws_ssm_activation.description: Registers an on-premises server or virtual machine with Amazon EC2 so that it can be managed using Run Command.

name.description: The default name of the registered managed instance.

description.description: The description of the resource that you want to register.

iam_role.description: The IAM Role to attach to the managed instance.

registration_limit.description: The maximum number of managed instances you want to register. The default value is 1 instance.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the object.

activation_code.description: The code the system generates when it processes the activation.

name.description: The default name of the registered managed instance.

description.description: The description of the resource that was registered.

expired.description: If the current activation has expired.

expiration_date.description: The date by which this activation request should expire. The default value is 24 hours.

iam_role.description: The IAM Role attached to the managed instance.

registration_limit.description: The maximum number of managed instances you want to be registered. The default value is 1 instance.

registration_count.description: The number of managed instances that are currently registered using this activation.
